sentences.en: Public health officials fear that because of vast underreporting, recorded statistics foreshadow much more severe conditions.
sentences.cn: 公共卫生官员害怕因为通报率严重偏低, 实际的情况可能比记录的统计数字更为严重.

sentences.en: The book then uses this information to foreshadow the direction that future anti - neoplastic therapies will take.
sentences.cn: 书然后使用这讯息预兆将来的 反 新生物的治疗将带的指示.

sentences.en: The disappointing sales figures foreshadow more redundancies.
sentences.cn: 令人失望的销售额预示着会有更多人被裁员。

sentences.en: The revolution foreshadowed an entirely new social order.
sentences.cn: 这场革命预示着一种全新的社会秩序将要出现。

sentences.en: Their words foreshadow events to come.
sentences.cn: 他们的话预示了所将要发生的事情.

trans.tran_en: to show or say that something will happen in the future
